item.title: Son of British couple held by Taliban 'ecstatic' as they return to UK
item.description: Jonathan Reynolds tells the BBC he is "overwhelmed" by release after nearly eight months in prison.

item.title: Estonia seeks Nato consultation after Russian jets violate airspace
item.description: Russia denies jets entered Estonian airspace in the same month as its drones violated the airspace of two other Nato members.

item.title: Key oceans treaty crosses threshold to come into force
item.description: Sixty states have ratified a global treaty to protect the oceans - it will become law in January.

item.title: Republican senator says US broadcast regulator acted like 'mafioso' on Jimmy Kimmel
item.description: The Texas senator affected a mobster accent to criticise how ABC was pressed to take action on the late-night host.

item.title: US forces strike third alleged drug vessel killing three, Trump says
item.description: Venezuela has condemned a series of strikes by US forces in the Caribbean targeting alleged drug traffickers.
